Report Study Information

Source: R/Report_StudyInfo.R
Report_StudyInfo.Rd

`r lifecycle::badge("stable")`

This function generates a table summarizing study metadata as an interactive [gt::gt()] wrapped in HTML.

Usage

Report_StudyInfo(
  dfGroups,
  lStudyLabels = NULL,
  strId = "study_table",
  tagHeader = htmltools::h2("Study Status"),
  lStudy = deprecated()
)

Arguments

dfGroups

`data.frame` Group-level metadata dictionary. Created by passing CTMS site and study data to [MakeLongMeta()]. Expected columns: `GroupID`, `GroupLevel`, `Param`, `Value`.

lStudyLabels

`list` A list containing study labels. Default is NULL.

strId

`character` A string to identify the output table.

tagHeader

`shiny.tag` An HTML tag or tags to use as a header for the table.

lStudy

`deprecated` Study information as a named list.

Value

A [htmltools::tagList()] to display a table of study information.

On this page
